description: Cold email automation tool for sales teams to send personalized outreach campaigns

actions.name: add_prospect_to_campaign
actions.description: Adds a new prospect or updates existing prospect data in a campaign

actions.name: add_prospect_to_list
actions.description: Adds a new prospect or updates existing prospect in the global prospect list

actions.name: blacklist_domain
actions.description: Add a domain to the blacklist to block sending to all prospects within that domain

actions.name: find_prospect_by_email
actions.description: Search for a prospect by their email address

actions.name: get_prospect_responses
actions.description: Fetch all responses from a specified prospect

triggers.name: campaign_completed
triggers.description: Triggers when a campaign is completed

triggers.name: email_opened
triggers.description: Triggers when a prospect opens an email

triggers.name: email_sent

triggers.name: followup_after_autoreply
triggers.description: Triggers when a follow-up is scheduled after an autoreply

triggers.name: link_clicked
triggers.description: Triggers when a prospect clicks a link in an email

triggers.name: prospect_autoreplied
triggers.description: Triggers when an autoreply is detected from a prospect

triggers.name: prospect_blacklisted
triggers.description: Triggers when a prospect is added to the blacklist

triggers.name: prospect_bounced
triggers.description: Triggers when an email to a prospect bounces

triggers.name: prospect_interested
triggers.description: Triggers when a prospect is marked as interested

triggers.name: prospect_invalid

triggers.name: prospect_maybe_later
triggers.description: Triggers when a prospect is marked as maybe later
